content.detailedDescription: Mcconnellesburg pa work 2nd shift walking to girlfriends place 1am looked like airplanes in distance one was bright and would flash green on left red on right slow pulses not like a flashbulb or aircraft with crimson orb next to it looked nw saw a brighter one flashing green and red got witnesses oct 29 just walked home from girlfriends nov 4 its closer in the east same thing 5am bright light green and red pulsating with crimson orb hovering never seen an aircraft hover that long never seen aircraft with slow pulsating lights more like flashbulb goin off its still out there you tell me drone or what
content.summary: Didnt land

content.detailedDescription: While driving going towards store around 3pm (melbourne time) when gps started acting up and we ended up getting lost 3 times. asked passenger to take picture of bridge (3 pictures) where we got lost. while outside store, heard humming sound and thought was a train sound but not likely since it was close to the freeway. while going home passenger took 2 more pictures. after arriving home and dropping off the passenger, got a call from her passenger about the picture that she notice a different object in the picture. that's when they started calling people and start getting opinion on what was on he picture. i got called about it and just relaying what has transpired.
content.summary: Notice humming noise and gps acted up resulting on getting lost 3 times, decided to take picture of bridge and continued on taking pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed with my ex girlfriend, we were both into crystal work together and had picked up some moldavite that day, while laying in bed meditating with the moldavite, i begin to hear telepathic voices come to me asking me why i was with her at that time. i could not answer them accurately, so they allowed me to ask them some questions, since i seemed to be in a state of confusion. i felt this was most kind of them. i asked who they were, they gave me a complicated name that i could not understand, but then told me they were called the pluvians, as that was the name they chose for the humans to call them. they asked me to press my amethyst stone to the back of my head on my crown chakra after answering my question, and upon doing that i felt a surge of energy rush through me. they then spoke to me and said "look outside please" i looked outside feeling slightly apprehensive, and i saw 4 holograms hiding behind the trees in the lot behind my apartment, they were a light grey color with dark eyes. i then laid back in my bed after seeing them, but i could still see them with what felt like the inside of my mind. they showed me their shape with my mind like this, amethyst still held to the back of my head, it felt as if they used the crystal as an antenna of some type of energy conductor, and it allowed me to see their ship from within my room. it was shrouded in the skys and it looked like a royal mothership with a futuristic turbine shape, i was shown the inside of the ship. it was silver and almost clean chrome appearing, with many modules and complicated looking systems. upon being shown the inside of the ship i felt an intense panic, and my mind refused to allow me to see anymore. upon feeling my mind come back to a non-amplified state, i asked them one final question. it concerned my future, i asked them what it held. they answered me with "you will with with the reptilians, once you are done with the reptilians, you will work with the pleiadians. when you are done with the pleiadians, you will be able to do anything" if anyone can make further sense of this, please offer me your insight. i cannot shake my pursuit of answers on what they have told me. it's become a bit maddening over the years and as life progresses i only see it unfolding more and more. how would the pluvians know this? and what race do the pluvians come to genesis from? after they answered my question they asked me if i wanted to ask anymore. i felt at peace and told them i would be ok if they left. they respectfully left, but they've been watching me with other races as well.
content.summary: Shown holograms of the ones calling themselves pluvians and was offered to go into their ship.

content.detailedDescription: July 26, 2015 around 2:45am  in northern maine i stepped outside on the back steps for some clean night air before i turned in for the night. i looked up as i always do at night to enjoy the numerous stars in the night sky. it was no more than 20seconds when i locked onto a light that was displaying erratic flight patterns covering vast area of the sky in what appeared to be milliseconds. i knew this was no man made aircraft.  i watched as the light would shoot from one side to the next rising, diving, turning, wobbling, and even going in circles as it rose so i could see the lights on  outside then the lights on the inside of the object. it repeated the same movements in the sky much like a military aircraft pilot might fly a sortie. i felt more than safe as the object i watched for at least 15 minutes was to far away  from me and it appeared to me as a ball of light most of the time while i viewed the object. i shot video of the object and only just two weeks ago viewed it before i was about to delete it. wow!!! i was floored at the beauty of the majestic flight, colors, speed, that this craft preformed. i actually got tired of viewing the object and i went to bed shortly after 3am it was still in the sky bouncing about. i did wish i could have gone along for the ride. three of the  pictures are blown up stills from the video and are all the same object. this is not the first experience for me i know what i saw and this time i have the proof, thanks for reading.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I observed a light in the night sky that changed direction, ascended, descended rapidly.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened a cpl years ago and i was never going to report it. what brought me here to do so some two years later started off because of youtube of all things and i wasn't even watching ufo stuff to begin with. i watched a vid about mars because of some story i read on the net and the suggested videos off of that video reminded me of my experience so i googled the description of the object i saw to see if anybody else had ever seen what i saw because it was pretty unique and different from the classic cliche ufo sightings that are out there and sure enough, people have.  

what i looked up was "triangular, transparent ufo" and it brought me to a guy that had taped one in night vision.  the one i saw had no lights but the one this guy saw did. but here's the kicker that brought me to this site to report.. to his naked eye, there was no visible lights but through his night vision camera, there were.  that made me think "if i would've had night vision too, would i have seen lights?"  his story gets explained away as a plane up high being re-fueled by another. but i'm a 1000% confident that that is not what i saw.  let me explain why.

now this happened super fast.  approx 10-15 seconds at most, but probably a bit less that that in all reality. prob more like 7-10 seconds. i went outside to smoke a cigarette around midnightish. i was facing the east. i was staying at my girlfriends house and i live more in the inner city where you can't see the stars so well due to city lights.  where she lives is still in the city (suburbs) but her block is really dark with no lit up street lights on it and the lights from the surrounding busier streets are kind of blocked by her house so you can see the stars a lot better than at my house. it stood out to me because i'd go outside to smoke at both places. i like astronomy and that sort of stuff too so i'll commonly just look up at the moon and stars and think about the cosmos or just stuff going on in my life.  i was looking almost straight up at a brighter star and fixated on it when all the sudden this really low, triangle shaped, transparent object flies under the star i'm looking at (i could still see the star through it). without being tracked on that star i don't think i would've seen it for obvious reasons (it was transparent). i tracked it with my eyes and it was moving due east. completely silent. for the first few seconds it was moving relatively slow but as it got to about a 60-70 degree angle, it all ofl the sudden tripled in speed and quickly darted out of sight. it seemed to sort of curve downward with the natural curvature of the earth and the house i was at at sits at a higher elevation than the surrounding area so i my prospective was good. no trees right in front of me to block my view and there's a building next door, and her front yard is higher up than the roof of that building. it's like you're almost level with the tree tops in the surrounding distance so i didn't lose sight if it until it was just a little bit above the horizon line. it wasn't huge but it wasn't small either.  probably the size of a golf ball in relation to the sky and the star fit easily inside of it with room for 15-20 more stars to fit inside of it. i've seen planes super high up in the sky. it was clear that this was definitely closer due to size and speed and even how the star looked in relation to it. i'd say 1000-5000 feet with 5000 being very extreme.

this sighting isn't extreme or crazy like the kind of sightings you see on tv (seems not worthy of reporting really compared to those) but the reason i'm going ahead and putting this on here is just in case other people in my area might have seen the same thing at or around that time or just seen it ever period.. it has been so long that my date of this sighting is "approximate".  it really was strange. i kind of stood there weirded out for a few minutes and once 15-20 minutes passed, i started even second guessing myself if i actually saw something, but in all reality, i know i did. i mean, i tracked the thing steadily all the way to the horizon for several seconds.
content.summary: Low,triangular, transparent object that made zero noise.

content.detailedDescription: I sat outside for a smoke this evening at 8:15 pm pst, in chilliwack, bc canada and i saw a rather large object in the sky.  it was dark outside, partly cloudy.  i could tell the object was fairly close above the earth, there was no noise.  it seemed quite large, larger than a jet airplane.  it was difficult to tell the exact shape because the outline blended in with the dark sky.  what i could see was two large windows on either side and they were emitting glowing white lights. the windows is what i found to define the object that i saw.  it soared through the air slow enough where i could take a look for almost a minute, then it was out of my line of sight.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in chilliwack, bc canada

content.detailedDescription:
Hello.

sorry for my english since i'm from norway. 

i am a norwegian that has been staying in thailand for a while. i am 33 years old.

tonight i witnessed something strange in the sky where i live in cha am. i was out driving on my motorbike with my wife. when i was going to make a right turn going into the village where we live i noticed something in the sky up to the left. 

it was a light. i was driving so i had i had to slow down to figure out what it was. when i slowed down and looked at it i saw a flying object and it took off in very high speed going out in the sea. i coul see it gain speed then just vanish.

the object was a light and it happened so fast to describe how it looked like, but how it was hovering with no sound and how it took off was the most unbeleivable thing.

when i first saw the object it immediatley cought my attention cause i havent seen anything like it before. hard to explain. just got the feeling. and its strange cause i just felt like looking up to the left for som reason. as if something inside me wanted me to see it. cause it's not normal to look up and to the left when im focusing on taking a right turn.

it didnt last more then 4-5 seconds but i know what i saw. im all shook up. i never seen anything like it. it was just like a movie and things i have seen on youtube. 

now its rainging heavy here with thunder storms.


also there has been many small flights hovering over cha am tonight. they have been going back and forth like they are looking for something. 
i have never seen any flights hovering over where i live as long as i have stayed here. and i been living here for 11 months now.

my wife did not see it and i havent said so much cause she just laugh it off.Maybe because she is thai and its out of her beleif. i can't understand why my reaction was so slow to point the thing out so my wife also could see it. 

i was shocked after witnessing this. it is hard to describe when you actually witness something like that but i was pretty shaky yesterday. and i felt the urge to go outside for a walk and not stay inside. i spotted at least three small flights hovering over cha am where i live. 

i also had a wierd dream tonight.I'll try to describe it:
i was fixing some batteries on my telephone in the living room. my wife was in the shower. as i sat on my desk working on the phone i heard this clicking sound. like a needle falling somewhere. then i heard it on the front door window. like something was clicking on the glass. as i turned my head and looked at the window there was a black shadow figure outside the window. like a black force of something. i shouted to my wife in the shower and the next thing i remember i woke up.

peter
content.summary: Object spotted over cha am thailand. at least three seeking flights hovering over cha am after the incident.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend had gone outside. looking around and seen what at first i thought could of been a star. but it was very large and very bright. then it started rising up very very slowly. coming our direction. i started taking pictures of it. it almost looked to be a triangle. very bright lights. so i have a couple of photo's of it. i think they are okay photo's. was excited to see something. and someone was actually with me to witness it. what he could see of it. he just had his eyes worked on and has no glasses at the moment. but he did see something with me. i lost sight of it going east. then i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Thought at first it was a star. but too big and bright. then it started rising up and traveling our direction.

content.detailedDescription: I sat on my balcony and peered at the stars. just relaxing and all of a sudden i saw a huge ball of glowing orange. i sat there a few seconds just taking it in and then trying to figure out what i was seeing. best i can describe it was bigger than the stars around it. like 10 times the circumference. i sat there looking at it like it was just a big orange ball of light. i assumed that was all it was until it seemed to shoot up straight into the sky in an instant and was gone. i never saw it again . it hovered for a matter of minutes and then snap, it was gone. what it did is not what i know our military or any type of flight is capable of. i was left with a sense of awe and a lot of questions. i had people with me who did not witness it with me, so i did not tell them what i saw for fear they would laugh at me. i know what i saw....
content.summary: Bright orange light hovered, and then went up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I mike holland was in side the shop friend matt called on the phone 
 he said go outside you have to see this 

 note we do this al the time we have seen triangle, lights here them gone many times but tonight was different  . ok i went on to the deck and started to see lights blinking red and white airplane but many of them  4 or 5 then i turned  of the lights and that's when the firefly s started to show up blinking but ore like sparkling i tried to count i got to 7 and started over many times no pattern like swarming moving back and forth from one side of the sky to to the other .. formed a triangle . then back to the other side of the sky.
content.summary: They looked like firefly s group of 7 . moving back and forth with other joining in matt and i saw them . they moved up down all went to one side .Then back to the other . they lined up formed a triangle  i would say over 10 of them white in color flashin

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and noticed something felt off. i looked in the sky and noticed the objects. i went inside and called my friend first on facebook audio, then that software lost wifi connection so i ran into my house and called on a phone. he also noticed the same objects. they appeared to be three white orbs flying in a triangle formation the orbs had somewhat of a glow in the space between them. the three objects hovered for about 45 seconds to a minute then steadily progressed over the hillside until out of sight. after noticing the three orbs it was noticed there were about 5-8 separate aircrafts following the objects. the reason there were assumed to be aircraft is because they had alternating white and red flashing lights. there was a noise almost like a huge rushing wind when the orbs went out of sight.
content.summary: Three white orbs hovered in a triangle formation for about 45 seconds. afterward they kept perfect formation and decended over the hillside. it was followed by about 6 aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Driving on rt80 headed west in knott county ky in the sky i saw a white cylinder moving at ver slow speed the turned a little almost stop it has no wings and left no contrail totally blowed my mind.I tries to think what it could be and could not come up with anything conventanal and i said that's a ufo i've seen and heard about on tv i'm an avage sky watched and no what planes and stars etc it was none of them and the feeling i had was not feat i was excited.Michael brown.
content.summary: White cylinder under clouds moving slow or hovering

content.detailedDescription: I know you may think that this might have been part of the filming and story line of the episode but i assure you it was not. in the first fifteen minutes of the episode the black detective walks into a cafe and signals his daughter to step out side to talk while they are walking they pause to stop and if you look in the sky in the back round you can clearly see a round object in the sky move to the right of the screen separate into two then come back together get larger them move quickly off to the left. this was not part of the episode as there is no ufo's in the flash . i was amazed to have caught this and why the film crew did'ent i have no idea.
content.summary: On an episode of the flash on 11/3/2015  film crew did not catch or edit

content.detailedDescription: I  have  seen  object   at  least   5  times  in  6  weeks.  i noticed  it  while standing  on  my  front  porch.  i  just  happened  to  look  into  the  sky.  and  there it was.   i  thought   it  may  have  been an  airplane.   since  that is  the  direction of the  airport.  but  it just  hovers.  and    the  lights constantly  flicker .   it  has   a bank  of  lights  on  the bottom and on top.   red  and  white.  i  got  curious  and   astonished.    i  turned  my head  for  a  second  and it  was  gone. didn't  see  it  anywhere  else.   it  just  disappeared .  not  sure  of  the date  i  first  saw  it.  i  was  back  in  september.  my  i  just saw  it for the  5th time  on  november  3,   2015
content.summary: It  just  hovers.  maybe  minutes.  sometime  hours.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on swift road in the passenger seat. my fiance and i both looked in the sky and said do you see that. a huge orb appeared, almost the size of the moon during the day time. at the end of our finishing sentence it zoomed south west and dissapeared. it left  green/blue trail behind it for less than 10 seconds. almost like it dissapeared into thin air.I noticed the object because it appeared in the middle of open dark sky. no lights around. i thought it was possibly government craft until it zoomed and dissapered into thin air. it appeared. hovered just long enough to be noticed and shot off. goosebumps and increased heart rate. it just dissapeared.
content.summary: Driving in car sw, bright white orb appeared 90 degrees in sky air plane near area, could tell the difference. orb was huge. appeared hovered for 2 seconds then zoomed and just dissapeared. blue/green and white trail left behind in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I observed the object from my balcony. it first appeared blue and moved very slowly. then it stopped then moved again. always in a straight line. it then turned red. it hovered for about a minute then went the opposite direction but on the same path and very quickly til it was no longer in view
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved then hovered repeatedly. changed colors and direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from my boyfriend's house around 8:15 pm, a trip i make almost every single day. the trip home is on a dark road surrounded by woods that's the main road between my town and the next. it was still early enough for there to be a small amount of traffic and up until this point there had been a pretty steady supply of cars. 

i keep a close eye out for deer because they're common in the area, so i was driving while scanning the sides of the road when some lights caught my eye. i didn't think much of it because the lights from my dash always reflect in my windows but i took another look because they weren't the usual reflections. i slowed down and kept looking and realized they were definitely outside of my car. up near the tops of the trees were three, stacked lights. two white and then a red on the end. they were just balls of light, circular and steady. 

i looked ahead, because i was still driving and swerving all over the road, and when i looked back they had moved into a triangle! at that point a car came up behind me and i started driving faster again and looked over and it was gone. i don't think the globes of light were big enough to carry any entities on their own, and it's possible the change of shape was just a trick of the eye.

i can think of no reasonable explanation what kind of stacked lights would be flying through the trees in ct so here i am, despite the fact that i detest the notion of aliens. i couldn't think of anyone else to report this too because i don't think the police would be exceptionally helpful in the matter and i know i'm not crazy. it made me extremely nervous and i ran into my house and locked the doors as soon as i got home, even though it now sounds irrational in hindsight. it even made me nervous while i was driving, which is why i didn't just stop. i could easily have stopped and stayed in my car and watched, but for some reason it just didn't feel safe.
content.summary: Driving saw 3, stacked lights that moved into a triangular shape

content.detailedDescription:
I normally let my dog out before bed & again around 2-3am. i usually stare at the stars. during one occasion i noticed this " star" seemed out of place, closer than any other star and flickered more than normal stars. i attributed it to the "star" being closer than any other star. the first time the " star" disappeared, i just thought i had seen the tail end of a falling star-made nothing of it. it was not until i started paying attention to it that i noticed that once the "star" stopped flicker, it would become slightly larger & immediately shoot straight up & out of sight. there was no arch to it's flight pattern but rather straight up-like a rocket. it disappeared, out of sight, within 1-2 seconds. i saw this a couple of times over a cypress tree, a couple times over other trees.
a couple time while enjoying a bbq/bone fire (7-9pm), i saw this event. others, around the same time, have seen the same thing over other trees, independent of what i've seen. on other occasions, while walking the dog around the park directly next door (7-9pm), others have witnessed the same thing-independent of my experience.
we have also noticed a constant and loud reverberation in the area. the sound is louder in the evening and early morning hours when the day to day sounds have either stopped or lessened.
content.summary: Starlike object flickered for a couple of minutes then, simultaneously it became a solid light & shot up into the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I thought i was staring at a very close, unfamiliar star; it flickered for while while hovering over a cypress tree then, simultaneously it became a bright, slightly larger, steady light and shot straight up into space. there was no arch in the flight path but rather a straight up shot. this has happen a few other times over the same tree at different hours & a few other times in the same area but not too far. this has been witnesses by others.
i normally let my dog out before bed and around 2-3m. i usually look at the stars while i wait & that's why this "star" seemed out of place.The first time i saw this activity, i thought i was lucky enough to see the ending of a falling star therefore thought nothing of it. when i noticed the "star" again, i thought it was part of earth"s rotation. when the star kept reappearing, i watched it: i saw it flicker for a while, change into a steady bright light & then shoot straight up, disappearing. a couple times it happened while i was enjoying a  bbq/bone fire-around 7-9pm.
during a bone fire, another person saw the same thing over palm trees-all in the same vicinity as well as when walking the dog in the park next door-7-9:30pm.
we didn't experience fear but rather curiosity as to what it was we have been watching. to date, no answer. we do, however, notice a constant reverberations in the area. it is most noticeable during the evening/night hours when the "normal" sounds of day to day living have stopped or lessen.
content.summary: I thought i i was staring at a very close, unfamiliar star; it flickered & simutaniousl became a steady, bright light while zooming straight upward out of sight. this happened a couple of times in the same location & a couple other times in the surround.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object while i was driving a van going up a hill road called the wisp while i was driving on my left hand side about 200-300feet away i saw this very large electric blue ball about 150foot by 150foot to my n.N.W as i watched this object i could not believe what i was looking at not every day do you see something like this then i put on my main beam of my headlights on in the van at that exact moment the object went from the ground to the straophere.In the blink of an eye . when this happened for the next 10 mins or so i kept saying to myself did i just see what i thought i've seen and kept repeating that over and over again i've told very few people about what i saw i know what i saw and what i saw was a large blue ball go from the ground right up into the sky at what i believe to be the speed of light and to tell you the truth i find it hard to understand what i saw but i did and no one could change my mind on that what i saw could never be man made not that shape nor that speed it happened two years ago and its took me all this time to do something about it i hope someone could tell me somethiong about it but i now believe in ufo's
content.summary: Large circle electric blue in colour which left the ground straight up at the fastest rate of speed you could think of speed of light ?

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 4:45 pm and it was still fairly light with the sun going down. the whole sky was open in front of me on a long stretch of straight highway, so it is not like i came around a big bend and suddenly saw this, so it did not cross in front of me, but just suddenly appeared to my left moving horizontally away from me. it was a spherical shaped, very bright bluish/green light, the color and brilliance of which i have never seen in the sky before; moving too fast for a plane, but probably about as fast a small passenger jet. i would have written it off as maybe an odd reflection of the setting sun on a jet, but it separated into two equally sized spheres right before my eyes, and then went for about 4 seconds at the same rate of speed, and then with a whole sky before it, just poof, disappeared??? the whole sighting occurred with in about 9 or 10 seconds.

occurred between exit 7 and 8, about 1/3 the distance passed exit 7 heading east bound toward albany.
content.summary: Very bright blue/green sphere that divided into 2 spheres of the same size and same rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I left my home at 10 pm with my 2 children to pick up my wife from her friend's house. my oldest child was still awake, but my youngest was asleep. when i put my youngest child in his seat to buckle him up i thought he started to cry because of the cold. when i got in the driver's seat i realized he was actually laughing hysterically. i shook him and woke him up asking him what was funny and if he was okay. he glared at me and said nothing. i have never seen a look like that on his face before. i thought it was strange.  he began laughing hysterically again so hard he was shaking. i tried to speak to him, but he just kept laughing. it started to scare me, almost like he was possessed. right before i pulled over to wake him again i saw a blue light falling from the sky. i thought it was an airplane light at first, but it was not the controlled decent of an airplane. the light then changed from blue to purple then disappeared behind the tree line. my oldest child got scared and began to cry. after i woke my youngest again, he gave me the same dirty look and then fell asleep again and started laughing. after i woke him up for the third time he looked upset and sad, he fell back asleep and didn't make a sound for the rest of the night. this experience has bothered me enough to report it and i have a gut feeling my child's behavior and the light are connected.
content.summary: Light falling from the sky. changed from blue to purple before disappearing behind tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
I remembered being stuck with a needle in my right side.Twelve hours later i awoke in a different location.12 years later a catscan revealed a tiny object in my head -a transmitter.When i awoke i reached down to touch my groin for some reason and found a slick residue on it.I immediately went and took a shower.
12 - 14 years after the event i was approached by a white humanoid in california.
content.summary: Ufo and occupants were using invisibility devices.

content.detailedDescription: On oct 28 2015 i was awakened about 3:30 am with a noise. i turn my outside cameras on. and thats when i seen an unusual object.At the back of our door.It was a bright white light. floatingat i immediately got up and went to get my fiance from the den.So now he is seeing exactly what i am seeing. we looked at it for a while with shock and disbelief.And i was afraid.I had all kind of thoughts. going through my mind.I thought what if it's a ghost but i don't believe in ghost. he went to go see what it was.Even though i pleaded not to.He couldn't see anything he came back to the room. and ask me could i still see it. yes i could.We are now at the camera.  all night we could not sleep at times it just stood still. barely moving them it would start moving in front of the cars seem like it would go crazy by the cars. then it would start moving even more.It would go up down and sideways and the light seem to have a glow around it. circling it and it had two long shadow things attached to it. when 5am came it seemed to slightly open and take off as fast as it could.It has returned numerous nights. we just don't understand what it could be please help
content.summary: Bright  light ball  something circling above

content.detailedDescription: Outdoors enjoying the night.  the red orange light caught my attention.  i thought the object was a plane or a star.At first it was stationary, then it moved deliberately. the way it moved struck me as odd.A pulsating light that was random but deliberate.  under intelligent control.  it was bigger than the biggest star. it moved around random but delibrate.I was curous and filled with wonder.Felt normal after the sighting.
content.summary: Sky obsevred saw red orange light pulsating and then changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
Hola,

esta es una foto que he visto desde nio en muchos sitios de mi ciudad, es una foto antigua como de 1940, algo asi, alli se observa un objeto con forma de sombrero, no me parece una lampara por que no veo su poste, esta foto la tome de un cuadro antiguo.

me parece curiosa, puede ser cualquier cosa, pero en esa epoca la gente no pensaba en naves espaciales ni cosas asi, no creo que sea un montaje, la gente ve esa foto y no nota que hay algo ahi que quien sabe que sera.

gracias.
content.summary: Like a hat

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband and i believe we have pictures of an ufo it was not visible to the eye but it was captured by my cell phone camera
content.summary: The sky was clear not a cloud i took 2 pictures of the full moon it was beautiful the object was not visible on the sky but it was on the pictures

content.detailedDescription:
Still feels like yesterday. .
..I was 9 years old living in wasilla, alaska 1986. my mother had put us to bed, but i'm a night owl, and i have always loved the stars. i was watching out my bedroom window,  watching a big orange star. well, i thought it was a star.  as it got closer, it was really hot, giving off a lot of heat like the sun.  the next thing i remember,  i was on a metal table....Not strapped down, but i couldn't move a bit, as if i was being restrained. they surrounded the table. ...I was screaming and all of a sudden my voice wasn't coming out of my mouth, but it was inside head and so loud. ...I stopped! they had mouths,  but they didn't use them to communicate,  they were talking to me inside my head!
 they proceeded to poke and prod me, through my bellybutton and between my toes. they seemed to be trying to soothe me, by stroking my forehead like my mother did when i didn't feel good.  i don't recall how i got back in my bed, but when i opened my eyes, i was drenched!  as if i had jumped in a pool!   i immediately ran to my mother's room and began to tell her what had happened. she was quite freaked out,  but did believe me. we still talk about it from time to time,  but we've always wondered. ....What happened! ? i was recently watching the history channel and i saw the episode of the japan flight over anchorage in 1986, i  was frozen in shock! i looked at my husband and said, that's it! that's the ufo that took me!!!!!!!!
content.summary: I was 9 years old, watching a " big orange star" out my bedroom window,  i have no recollection of how i got on the craft, but the details i still remember haunt me!  i saw on tv recently, the story of the japan flight over anchorage, i saw the same thing

content.detailedDescription:
I was in south africa in the eastern cape. i went outside to look at the star, when i noticed a peculiar looking star. at first it flashed a glint of red, that is what caught my attention. i ignored it for a few weeks only to stop every now and then noticing how it got more intense as the weeks went by. one evening i stopped suddenly to observe what would turn out to be a glowing & pulsating orb. i proceed to take action & took out my iphone to record & document this strange event.

over the next year & a half i have recorded many of my observations in sa and i have seen orbs do amazing feats such as, changing into many diffrent colours, accelerating , decelerating, morphing into various aircrafts & manipulating the forces of nature in particular matter & light evan the weather around them.

when reviewing my footage i have noted a signature of the orbs & other crafts. this unique signature involves three white lights that revolve around the craft like an electron & a proton would. in all the videos you can see these dots flashing in various patterns but more commonly always three, although i have seen many more in the same particular piece of space.

in this footage you can see a huge ship open up a door with bright orange polymers that burn a very bright orange/yellow. the ship seems to be grey & black .

it is interesting to note the green silhouettes that come out and seem to vibrate intensely, flickering around rather iratticly yet with some sort of ultimate purpose.

if you look at the light post or lamp in the video you can see a glowing aura around it, then in an instant it swirls & seems to be vacuumed & channeled. it would appear as if it sends the light energy to another orb that burn yellow/orange, sending & receiving energy from an ordinary lamp post.

what happened next stunned me, it would appear that a large hand or animated object moves past the vessel as if to be some sort of tool to assist & interact with objects. i appears to be a rather massive shadow.

i can honestly say i feel privileged to have observed so much activity in this time & i still see them often around the space around my home in southern africa eastern cape.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing plasma orb's controlling light & energy with massive spaceship & giant animated hand !

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my living room watching tv,which was positions under the south side window. across the street from me was a large cattle pasture. now this is the country where all sounds could be heard and  any air craft flying at this altitude was never seen at all. while watching tv i saw a very bright light coming toward our home. my first thought was a plane was going to crash into our home. i ran to the window to see what it was. it was moving very slowly going north it was cylindrical and passing over the west side of my property line passing out of my view. i ran quickly to the north window the object was still moving slowly north at maybe 40 miles per our. it appears to be cigar shaped with 4 square windows visible to me. it was close enough to me that i could see the silvery interior than it just disappeared. wondering how it could have gone out of sight i ran outside and it was simply gone.
content.summary: Cigar shape with square windows one bright light on nose silvery apearance
